name: JumpSwitchLand - OpenGameArt Summer Game Jam 2022 Entry
name_original: JumpSwitchLand - OpenGameArt Summer Game Jam 2022 Entry
description:
SPACE to jump

A, S and D to switch your board type. 

Tip: Match your board colour with the slime on the pipe for the most speed.

----

Our entry for OpenGameArt's Summer Game Jam 2022.  The goal of the jam was to produce a game using OpenGameArt assets and the theme was slime. Timespan was 4 weeks, but we only had a few days each overall to put into the game.

Developers:

  • idotherock
  • matt_barney
  • Samvc
  • Tazzfalcon
